title: Birth rate and women in parliament relationship

content.question: A political scientist investigating the relationship between birth rate and the number of women in parliament compiles data into the bar graph shown above, which suggests that

choices.label: Mexico, Great Britain and China have the highest percentage of women in parliament
Russia and Iran have the highest birth rates
women in Nigeria are more likely to be in parliament than to have babies
Mexico has the highest birth rate and the highest percentage of women in parliament
Iran has the highest percentage of women in parliament

content.answer: Mexico, Great Britain and China have the highest percentage of women in parliament
